sentences.en: A little way further down the lane we passed the driveway to a house.
sentences.cn: 顺着巷子再走过去一点，我们经过车道来到一幢房子前。

sentences.en: A sudden glare of headlights lit the driveway.
sentences.cn: 突然一辆汽车的头灯照亮了车道.

sentences.en: Agnew's car pulled into the driveway at exactly five o'clock.
sentences.cn: 阿格纽的车在5点整驶入了车道。

sentences.en: As he pulled into the driveway, he saw her bedroom light was off.
sentences.cn: 当他把车开进车道时，他看到她卧室的灯已经熄了。

sentences.en: He drove down the long, steeply angled driveway.
sentences.cn: 他驱车从又长又陡的车道驶下。

sentences.en: He pulled into the driveway in front of her garage.
sentences.cn: 他把车停在了她家车库前的车道上。

sentences.en: He pulled sedately out of the short driveway.
sentences.cn: 他慢慢地把车开出了巴掌大的私人车道。

sentences.en: He tends the flower beds and evergreens that he has planted in the driveway.
sentences.cn: 他打理着他栽在车道两旁的花坛和常青树。

sentences.en: I saw five cop cars pull into the driveway. And I literally freaked.
sentences.cn: 我看到5辆警车开进了我家的车道。我简直吓坏了。

sentences.en: I stood in the driveway and watched him back out and pull away.
sentences.cn: 我站在车道上，看着他把车倒出来然后开走。

sentences.en: I was running down the driveway to the car and I lost my balance.
sentences.cn: 我正沿着车道向车子跑去，然后我失去了平衡。

sentences.en: In one driveway a chauffeur wearing rubber boots was hosing down a limousine.
sentences.cn: 其中一条私人车道上，一位穿着橡胶靴的专职司机正用水管冲洗一辆豪华轿车。

sentences.en: She heard the crunch of tires on the gravel driveway.
sentences.cn: 她听到轮胎轧过石子铺成的车道，发出嘎吱声。

sentences.en: The car idled in the driveway.
sentences.cn: 这辆车停在行车道上,引擎发动着.

sentences.en: The driveway makes a hook around an old tree.
sentences.cn: 车道绕过一棵老树来了个急转弯.

sentences.en: You can't park here, you're obstructing my driveway.
sentences.cn: 你不能在这里停车，你挡住了我家的车道。

推动，发动（机器等）；驾驶（马车，汽车等）；驱赶

trans.tran_en: the hard area or road between your house and the street
